评论详情: It’s a cute set, I got the cream/white color. The top has removable pads and the bottoms are a good length, not too short. Soft material and seems like the quality is good. Might buy in another color
So comfortable and cute. Very supportive. True to size.

I really like this workout set! The ribbed material feels comfy and supportive, but it doesn’t have a ton of give, so I do wish I’d sized up slightly for a little extra comfort. That said, it’s great for yoga and low-impact exercises, and it stays in place while I move. The quality is solid, and it still looks good after a few washes.
so cute, I bought so many different sets already haha

UPDATE: I also ordered the grey set. It’s a bit different than pictured but still nice! I added an image of it next to my previously purchased navy set for comparison. By the way, I washed it without issue (no color bleeding, shrinking, etc.). I air dried one but the other was accidentally dried in the dryer on a regular cycle but nothing happened to it so I consider these to be of great quality.  ORIGINAL REVIEW: I’m 5’9, 150lbs, and wear a 36C bra size and this fits great! I’d purchased two sets (navy and black) and I felt comfortable during my cycling class and strength training. I have yet to try this set for yoga but I’ll update this when I get the chance.  The point is that this set moves comfortably with my body and I’m not constantly adjusting my chest area during my workout. I was dripping sweat but it didn’t show on the set (possibly because of the colors I picked). I could feel it absorbing sweat but there weren’t any stains or anything so I was pleased.  The high waist looks great and creates a slimming effect so I’ll definitely be purchasing again in every color 🩵!

She is muscular. Her twin is thinner and uses it occasionally to run. So on less muscular legs, it doesn’t roll so much. On muscular legs, it does.
